ValidationRule.description: When the Billing Frequency selected is "Annually", the Contract Term selected must be a multiple of 12 (i.e. 12, 24, 36, 48, etc.)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(Opportunity.RecordType.Name, "PGi"), IF(AND ( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c , 'Annually') , MOD(Contract_Term__c,12) <>0, $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False ),True,False))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the Billing Frequency selected is Annually, the Contract Term selected must be a multiple of 12
